text: Tol'ko tot na pryamom puti, kogo Allakh vedet pryamym putem. A dlya togo, kogo sbivayet s puti Allakh, ty ne naydesh' pokrovitelya, krome Nego. V Den' voskreseniya My soberem ikh lezhashchimi litsom vniz, slepymi, nemymi, glukhimi. Pristanishchem im budet ad. Kak tol'ko adskiy ogon' slabeyet. My razzhigayem yego
